case_title: IHSAN-UL-HAQ vs EXECUTIVE ENGINEER HIGHWAY and others

legal_provisions.land_acquisition_act: Section 18 and Section 23 of the Land Acquisition Act, 1894

appellant_arguments: Improper appreciation of evidence by trial judge
Ignoring the report of the local commission
Inadequate compensation for standing crops and fruit trees
respondent_arguments: Market value should be based on notification date under Section 4(1)
Trial court unjustified in enhancing rate without solid evidence

court_findings.local_commission_report: Detailed and comprehensive, rightly relied upon
court_findings.evidence_review: No misreading or non-appreciation of evidence found
